readable.title: 489773343_a8aecf7db3
readable.content: A small girl in pink and blue , on the beach , shows something to two black dogs . A young girl in a pink and blue wetsuit and oversized red flip flops presents a little red ball to a big black dog while another dog looks on . a young girl putting a red ball in a black dogs mouth on the beach The little girl in the sand is handing a ball to one of the two black dogs . two black dogs wait for a little girl to throw a ball at the beach
